author: Business Insider
description:
Frank's RedHot is the best-selling hot sauce in America, beating out competitors like Tabasco and Cholula. But how did the company build such a diehard following, even as hundreds of competitors swarm the market? 

CHAPTERS:
00:00 - Introduction
01:00 - How Frank’s RedHot Is Made
02:41 - The Slick Test
03:01 - Manufacturing 130,000 Gallons A Day
04:57 - History of Frank’s RedHot
05:40 - Cooking With Frank’s RedHot
06:42 - How Frank’s Competes With Rivals
07:06 - The Rise Of Hot Sauce
07:35 - The Economics Of Hot Sauce
08:06 - GenZ, Millennials, And The Hot Sauce Market
08:57 - Why the SuperBowl Is Frank’s Biggest Week
09:36 - Continuing Frank’s Legacy

title: How Frank's Red Hot Became America's Most Popular Hot Sauce Company | Big Business
